name: Data Analyst
description: Analyzes large datasets to identify trends, develop charts, and create visual presentations to help businesses make strategic decisions.

name: Software QA Engineer
description: Tests software to find bugs and issues before a product is released to the public, ensuring a high-quality user experience.

name: Network Engineer
description: Designs, builds, and manages the computer networks that power global communication for large companies.

name: Cybersecurity Analyst
description: Protects computer systems and networks from security breaches and cyberattacks.

name: UI/UX Designer
description: Designs the look, feel, and interaction of mobile apps and websites to make them easy and enjoyable to use.

name: Robotics Process Automation
description: Builds 'bots' to automate repetitive business processes, increasing efficiency and allowing humans to focus on more creative tasks.
